amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that amounts made available for Agriculture Buildings and Facilities and Rental Payments would be reduced by $13 million and the amount made available for the Office of the Secretary would be increased by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that amounts made available for Agriculture Buildings and Facilities and Rental Payments are reduced by $13 million and the amount made available for the Office of the Secretary is increased by $5 million.

action.text: Amendment (A040) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 252 (Roll no. 441).
